root.name: Dual Hearts
root.description: In Dual Hearts, the player controls a character named Rumble and his unusual sidekick Tumble. Set on Sonno Island, the main character rumble is on a quest for a legendary stone known as the Dream Stone. Tumble is on a separate quest to protect the dream orbs, and they eventually meet up. Together, they travel between various peoples dreams in order to find these orbs, search for the Dream Stone, and rid the people from nightmares.
